1_5.得標廠商: 來來國際企業股份有限公司

英文公告.機關名稱: Department of Civil Servant Development, Taipei City
英文公告.機關地址: 20,Lane 21, Sec.2, WanMei St., Taipei, 116, Taiwan, R.O.C
英文公告.標案名稱: The Invitation to Tender for Cafeteria Catering Services ,of 2013,2014
英文公告.廠商地址: 4F., No.12, Aly. 1, Ln. 1, Sec. 1, Yong’an S. Rd., Lujhou Dist., New Taipei City 247, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: Tenderer Qualifications:Tenderers must be legally registered companies with business scopes in instant food manufacturing, restaurants, and other food and beverage services. Tenders must be submitted no later than the closing date, with the following documents attached: copies of the certificates listed in the Tenderer Qualification Checklist (the credit data inquiry must be stamped with the seals of the inquiry agency,its authorized personnel, and the responsible clerk. The inquiry report would be void without these three seals. Please refer to Supplement Instruction to Tenderers for details), and 11 copies of the service proposal.Additional Information:1. Performance security deposit: NT$800,0002. The tender will be decided on the basis of a lump-sum price, but the contract is based on unit price. Projected demand quantity is not included in the contract. Unit price is calculated as follows: (1) breakfast: NT$35 per person; lunch: NT$65 per person; Dinner: NT$65 per person. Total amount depends on the actual number of people attending each meal. (2) For training courses held by outside groups, the supplier will be paid according to the actual number of people attending a meal.3. The maximum budget of this procurement project is NT$19,000,000. Contract period: Within 14 days from the notification of the procuring entity to December 31,2014. The contract is completed when either criteria is met.4. The evaluation of tenderer qualifications begins after the opening of tenders. The proposals of unqualified tenderers will not be considered. Qualified tenderers shall attend proposal evaluation sessions at Briefing Room C209 of the Department of Civil Servant Development (date to be notified). Post-tender negotiations will be held after the appropriate tenderers have been selected. This is a fixed-price tender, where negotiations are only aimed at the content of the contract.5. The cafeteria of DCSD is a place of internship for students of Wenshan School of Special Education.6. Any questions regarding the tender document must be submitted by writing prior to a quarter of the tender waiting period (anything less than a day is calculated as a day), which begins from the day that this invitation to tender is made public. The DCSD will respond to those questions no later than a day before the closing date of tender submission.7. For any questions, please contact the DCSD Office of General Affairs. Telephone number: 02-29320212 #354; Fax number: 02-29323299; Address: NO.20,Lane 21, WanMei St.Sec.2,Wenshan District, Taipei City, 11693, Taiwan, R.O.C8. For more information, please refer to the tender document.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.79.68機關名稱：臺北市政府公務人員訓練處
決標資料.附加說明: 履約期限：廠商應於機關通知日起14天內至103 年12月31日之期間內履行採購標的之供應。
